name: Some Text Adv Game
description:
A short text advanture game (in case it is not obvious enough from the title) with a little bit of puzzle-solving. Trust me, it is really easy. So easy that I hesitate to call it puzzle-solving. 

The game is only a few minutes long but hopefully it entertains you.

Please note that everything in this game is fictional and has nothing to do with anything from the real world. If something sounds really familiar, yea probably it is because thats_the_joke.jpg

Credits:

Sound: free resources found online
Everything else: Haotian Shen
